text.tspan: Death rate from particulate pollution (per 100,000) vs GDP per capita, 2010
Age-standardized death rate (per 100,000 people) from particulate matter less than 2.5 micrometres in diameter
(PM2.5) vs gross domestic product per capita (international-$).
Source: Penn World Table 9.0 (2016), Death rate from ambient PM2.5 air pollution - State of Global Air (2017)
Note: Size of country bubbles are representative of population size. Bubble colouring is representative of continent.
